title: Spicy Buffalo Deviled Eggs
description: Buffalo wings and deviled eggs come together to create this unique appetizer. Our Spicy Buffalo Deviled Eggs recipe is perfect for your Labor Day weekend and summer parties.
directions: Cut hard-boiled eggs in half lengthwise.
Remove egg yolks and place in a bowl.
Mash together the yolks with buffalo sauce, black pepper and mayonnaise with a fork.
Place a generous scoop of the buffalo sauce mixture into the egg white hole.
